channel.title: Curse prayer- soulsplit
channel.description:

item.title: Curse prayer- soulsplit
item.dc:creator: @blo0d_pker blo0d pker
item.description:
@blo0d_pker wrote:

if(c.curseActive[18] && c.oldNpcIndex > 0) { // SoulSplit fix, my way c.getPA().createPlayersProjectile2(nX, nY, offX, offY, 50, 50, 2263, 9, 9, - c.playerId - 1, 24, 0); c2.gfx0(2264); }
I used this to fix mine, it’s not perfect but works to my satisfaction. My players, when I ran a server, were satisfied with it too. You only need to figure out where to put it.

Read full topic

item.title: Curse prayer- soulsplit
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

Really hard to tell you what the problem is because of the terrible conventions.

Read full topic

item.title: Curse prayer- soulsplit
item.dc:creator: @faze1one faze1one
item.description:
@faze1one wrote:

AtomicInt_:

What’s the line…?

edit it its close to the bottom

Read full topic

item.title: Curse prayer- soulsplit
item.dc:creator: @faze1one faze1one
item.description:
@faze1one wrote:

if(c.curseActive[18]) { // SoulSplit GFX's - CAUSES CRASH if(c.oldNpcIndex > 0) { if(Server.npcHandler.npcs[c.oldNpcIndex] != null) { try { if(c.curseActive[18] && !c.prayerActive[23] && c.playerLevel[3] <= 99) { int heal = 3; if(c.playerLevel[3] + heal >= c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[3])) { c.playerLevel[3] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[3]); } else { c.playerLevel[3] += heal; } c.getPA().refreshSkill(3); } final int pX = c.getX(); final int pY = c.getY(); final int nX = Server.npcHandler.npcs[c.oldNpcIndex].getX(); final int nY = Server.npcHandler.npcs[c.oldNpcIndex].getY(); final int offX = (pY - nY)* -1; final int offY = (pX - nX)* -1; c.SSPLIT = true; c.getPA().createPlayersProjectile2(pX, pY, offX, offY, 50, 50, 2263, 9, 9, c.oldNpcIndex + 1, 24, 0); EventManager.getSingleton().addEvent(new Event() { public void execute(EventContainer b) { Server.npcHandler.npcs[c.oldNpcIndex].gfx0(2264); // 1738 line 348------------------- c.SSPLIT = false; b.stop(); } }, 500); /*EventManager.getSingleton().addEvent(new Event() { // CAUSES CRASH public void execute(EventContainer b) { //c.getPA().createPlayersProjectile2(nX, nY, offX, offY, 50, 50, 2263, 9, 9, - c.playerId - 1, 24, 0); b.stop(); } }, 800);*/ } catch (Exception e) { e.printStackTrace(); } } } }

Read full topic
